name: Meat & Bones
description:
A stealth survival rogulike game.

You are cought by Professor van Clavus and now you
have to escape from this evil place.
But beware of the horrific creatures and the deadly traps which are there.
Hide behind the hanging meat and eat apples to keep your body moving.

This game was made during the 7drl 2022 by
@norrimo (Programming, Design) & @ghoulvoice (2D Art & Soundtrack)
